languages.text: {n}Сегодня вся столица празднует день рождения вашего предка — Мильтиада Ореста Теона фон Валанциус, открывшего и колонизировавшего мир Кьява Гамма. Во всех ульях Даргонуса проходят служения в его честь, устраиваются ярмарки с увеселениями для знати и простолюдинов, и сам губернатор Драйвстем произносит ежегодную речь с главного шпиля своего дворца. Большинство служителей Администратума присоединились к празднеству. Сегодня работает лишь один заверитель на все окна.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сегодня вся столица празднует день рождения вашего предка — Мильтиада Ореста Теона фон Валанциус, открывшего и колонизировавшего мир Кьява Гамма. Во всех ульях Даргонуса проходят служения в его честь, устраиваются ярмарки с увеселениями для знати и простолюдинов, и сам губернатор Драйвстем произносит ежегодную речь с главного шпиля своего дворца. Большинство служителей Администратума присоединились к празднеству. Сегодня работает лишь один заверитель на все окна.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сегодня вся столица празднует день рождения вашего предка — Мильтиада Ореста Теона фон Валанциус, открывшего и колонизировавшего мир Кьява Гамма. Во всех ульях Даргонуса проходят служения в его честь, устраиваются ярмарки с увеселениями для знати и простолюдинов, и сам губернатор Драйвстем произносит ежегодную речь с главного шпиля своего дворца. Большинство служителей Администратума присоединились к празднеству. Сегодня работает лишь один заверитель на все окна.{/n}

{n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}今天，整个首都都在庆祝你祖先的诞辰。当初，就是米尔蒂亚斯·奥勒斯特·希恩·冯·瓦兰修斯发现了基亚瓦伽马星，在那里建立了殖民地。达戈努斯的每座巢都都在举行祈祷仪式。贵族与平民涌上街头，参加各种娱乐活动，就连德莱夫斯塔总督本人都登上了宫殿的尖塔，发表了年度演讲。内政部绝大多数仆人都加入了这场庆典，因此，今天只有一位认证官在处理各种事务。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}今天，整个首都都在庆祝你祖先的诞辰。当初，就是米尔蒂亚斯·奥勒斯特·希恩·冯·瓦兰修斯发现了基亚瓦伽马星，在那里建立了殖民地。达戈努斯的每座巢都都在举行祈祷仪式。贵族与平民涌上街头，参加各种娱乐活动，就连德莱夫斯塔总督本人都登上了宫殿的尖塔，发表了年度演讲。内政部绝大多数仆人都加入了这场庆典，因此，今天只有一位认证官在处理各种事务。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hoy toda la capital celebra el cumpleaños de tu ancestro Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, descubridor y colonizador de Kiava Gamma. En todas las colmenas de Dargonus se ofician servicios religiosos en su honor, nobles y plebeyos acuden a las ferias y los espectáculos y el gobernador Drivestem en persona da su discurso anual desde la aguja principal de su palacio. La mayoría de los sirvientes del Administratum se han unido a las fiestas, por lo que hoy solo hay un único oficial de certificación atendiendo a todas las ventanillas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hoy toda la capital celebra el cumpleaños de tu ancestro Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, descubridor y colonizador de Kiava Gamma. En todas las colmenas de Dargonus se ofician servicios religiosos en su honor, nobles y plebeyos acuden a las ferias y los espectáculos y el gobernador Drivestem en persona da su discurso anual desde la aguja principal de su palacio. La mayoría de los sirvientes del Administratum se han unido a las fiestas, por lo que hoy solo hay un único oficial de certificación atendiendo a todas las ventanillas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}今日は首都全体があなたの父祖、ミルティアデス・オレスト・テオン・フォン・ヴァランシウスの誕生日を祝福している。ミルティアデスはキアヴァ・ガンマを発見、征服した功績を持つ。ダルゴナスにあるすべてのハイヴではその栄誉を称える祈祷会が開かれ、貴族と平民は楽しい祭りに参加し、ドライブステン総督は邸宅の主尖塔から直々に年に一度の演説をする。行政局職員の大半がこの行事に参加してしまったため、今日は全部の窓口をひとりの認証役で担当していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}今日は首都全体があなたの父祖、ミルティアデス・オレスト・テオン・フォン・ヴァランシウスの誕生日を祝福している。ミルティアデスはキアヴァ・ガンマを発見、征服した功績を持つ。ダルゴナスにあるすべてのハイヴではその栄誉を称える祈祷会が開かれ、貴族と平民は楽しい祭りに参加し、ドライブステン総督は邸宅の主尖塔から直々に年に一度の演説をする。行政局職員の大半がこの行事に参加してしまったため、今日は全部の窓口をひとりの認証役で担当していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aujourd'hui, la capitale tout entière célèbre l'anniversaire de votre ancêtre, Miltiade Oreste Théon von Valancius, l'homme qui a découvert et colonisé Kiava Gamma. Dans chaque ruche de Dargonus, des messes sont données en son honneur, nobles comme roturiers font la fête dans la liesse générale et le gouverneur Drivestem lui-même prononce son discours annuel depuis la tour principale de son palais. Comme la plupart des agents de l'Administratum se sont joints aux festivités, il n'en reste plus qu'un seul pour traiter les dossiers en souffrance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aujourd'hui, la capitale tout entière célèbre l'anniversaire de votre ancêtre, Miltiade Oreste Théon von Valancius, l'homme qui a découvert et colonisé Kiava Gamma. Dans chaque ruche de Dargonus, des messes sont données en son honneur, nobles comme roturiers font la fête dans la liesse générale et le gouverneur Drivestem lui-même prononce son discours annuel depuis la tour principale de son palais. Comme la plupart des agents de l'Administratum se sont joints aux festivités, il n'en reste plus qu'un seul pour traiter les dossiers en souffrance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heute feiert die gesamte Hauptstadt den Geburtstag deines Vorfahren – Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, der Kiava Gamma entdeckt und kolonisiert hat. In jeder Makropole auf Dargonus werden zu seinen Ehren Gebetsmessen abgehalten, Adlige und Bürgerliche besuchen Volksfeste, und Gouverneur Drivestem persönlich hält seine jährliche Ansprache vom Hauptturm seines Palasts. Die meisten Administratum-Diener nehmen ebenfalls an den Festlichkeiten teil, weshalb heute für sämtliche Fenster nur ein einziger Zertifizierungsoffizier zur Verfügung steht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heute feiert die gesamte Hauptstadt den Geburtstag deines Vorfahren – Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, der Kiava Gamma entdeckt und kolonisiert hat. In jeder Makropole auf Dargonus werden zu seinen Ehren Gebetsmessen abgehalten, Adlige und Bürgerliche besuchen Volksfeste, und Gouverneur Drivestem persönlich hält seine jährliche Ansprache vom Hauptturm seines Palasts. Die meisten Administratum-Diener nehmen ebenfalls an den Festlichkeiten teil, weshalb heute für sämtliche Fenster nur ein einziger Zertifizierungsoffizier zur Verfügung steht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bugün tüm başkent, Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius'un doğum gününü kutluyor. Atalarından biri olan Miltiades, Kiava Gama'yı keşfedip koloni kurmuştu. Dargonus'taki her kovanda onun şerefine dua törenleri düzenleniyor; soylular, halkla birlikte eğlence fuarlarına akın ediyor, Vali Drivestem ise sarayının ana kulesinden yıllık konuşmasını bizzat yapıyor. Administratum hizmetkârlarının çoğu şenliklere katıldığı için bugün tüm bankolara sadece tek bir tasdikname memuru bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Today the entire capital is celebrating the birthday of your ancestor — Miltiades Orest Theon von Valancius, who discovered and colonised Kiava Gamma. In every hive on Dargonus, prayer services are being held in his honour, nobles and commoners are attending fairs with amusements, and Governor Drivestem himself is giving his annual speech from the main spire of his palace. Most of the Administratum servants have joined the festivities, so today all of the windows are being served by only one certification officer.{/n}
